answers.answer: You need to follow up on this with your doctor.  have you ever been tested for diabetes?  Having an increased glucose in your urine can also cause burning.  Also if you need tested for std's - ask for it.No chlamydia won't kill your sperm.grace

question: I have many questions..i want to know why i pee way too many times a day(for example at less 10 times a day) and my penis constanly burning from the inside,why is that?...And also can Chlamydia kill my sperm?
title: Help me understand my problems...........
